Check Course Environment

Source: R/check.R
mccourse_check.Rd

Runs a series of diagnostic checks to verify the student's environment is properly configured. Checks R version, RStudio, Quarto CLI, Git, and installed course templates.

Usage

mccourse_check(course = "mc451", min_r = "4.1.0")

Arguments

course

Character course identifier to check templates for (default: "mc451").

min_r

Character minimum R version required (default: "4.1.0").

Value

A named list with logical results for each check: r, rstudio, quarto, git, templates.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
mccourse_check()
} # }
